name: Papermaking

pages.text: Paper is made from the processed stalk of the $(l:mechanics/crops#papyrus)Papyrus$() crop. Paper is useful for written materials like $(thing)Books$() and $(thing)Maps$().
Papyrus must first be cut into strips with a $(thing)Knife$()
Then, papyrus strips are soaked in a $(l:mechanics/barrels)Barrel$() of $(thing)Water$().

Then, soaked papyrus strips are woven together in a loom to make $(thing)Unrefined Paper$(). Finally, it must be placed on a log and $(l:mechanics/leather_making#scraping)Scraped$() to make $(thing)Paper$().
